headline: BrightWire Electric
subheadline: Reliable Residential & Light Commercial Electrical Work
description: From panel upgrades to EV charger installations, we handle all your electrical needs with quality craftsmanship and transparent pricing.

services.name: Troubleshooting

servicesSubheading: Professional electrical services for homes and light commercial properties throughout the metro area.

about.heading: Quality Work. Fair Pricing. No Surprises.
paragraphs: BrightWire Electric has been serving homeowners and small businesses since 2015. Our team of licensed electricians brings decades of combined experience to every project, big or small.
We believe in transparent pricing, quality craftsmanship, and treating every home like it's our own. Whether you need a simple outlet repair or a complete panel upgrade, we're here to help.
All work backed by our satisfaction guarantee and full licensing and insurance.
about.hint: This could expand into a full 'About Us' page with team bios, certifications, service area map, and company history.

cta.heading: Ready to upgrade your electrical system?
cta.subheading: Let's discuss your project and provide a free, no-obligation estimate.
